com.caseybrooks.androidbibletools.basic

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.caseybrooks.androidbibletools.basic.Book
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ABSBook, CJBBook, SimpleBook

    public abstract class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    A base class for a single book in the Bible.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(int location)
        Set the location of this Book within the Bible. In a standard Bible, Genesis has location 1 and Revelation has location 66, but locations are not strict and are used mostly for sorting books into their canonical order.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of this Book

      • getLocation

        public int getLocation()
        Get the location of this Book
        Returns:
        the location of this Book

      • setChapters

        public void setChapters(int... chapters)
        The array of chapters encodes information about the number of verses in each chapter. The size of the array is the number of chapters in the Book, while the value of each item in the array is the number of verses in that chapter. Internally, this array is 0-indexed, but numVersesInChapter(int) is 1-indexed to be consistent with a printed Bible.
        Parameters:
        chapters - the count of verses for every chapter in this Book

      • setChapters

        public void setChapters(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> chapters)
        The array of chapters encodes information about the number of verses in each chapter. The size of the array is the number of chapters in the Book, while the value of each item in the array is the number of verses in that chapter. Internally, this array is 0-indexed, but numVersesInChapter(int) is 1-indexed to be consistent with a printed Bible.
        Parameters:
        chapters - the count of verses for every chapter in this Book

      • getChapters

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getChapters()
        Get the chapters of this Book
        Returns:
        the chapters of this Book

      • numChapters

        public int numChapters()
        Get the number of chapters in this Book.
        Returns:
        the number of chapters in this Book, or -1 if chapters is null

      • numVersesInChapter

        public int numVersesInChapter(int chapter)
        Get the number of verses in the specified chapter of this Book.
        Parameters:
        chapter - the specified chapter, 1-indexed
        Returns:
        the number of verses in this chapter, or -1 if the given chapter cannot be found

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Two Books are considered the equal if they represent the same book in the Bible. In other words, if they have the same location, then the books will be sorted into the same position, and are likely representative of the same book but in a different Bible version. Some versions use different numbering for the verses but are still the same Book, so we are just concerned with the Book's location.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - the other book to compare to
        Returns:
        whether the two books represent the same Book in the Bible

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        The hashcode is simply the exact location in the Bible this Book exists. In the case of two hashcodes being equal, it is assumed that the Books are the same, even if the books are of different languages.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the hashcode
